job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>RESPONSIBILITIES</strong></p><ul><li>Work with leaders from Data Science, Product, and Engineering to solve customer challenges with advanced data analysis and machine learning</li><li>Partner with software engineering to deliver automated, optimized pipeline for production products</li><li>Write scalable Python code in a cloud environment</li><li>Optimize code for large data sets</li><li>Identify innovative ways to optimize the application development process</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>QUALIFICATIONS FOR THIS JOB</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelors, Masters, or PhD in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, or Mathematics</li><li>3 to 5 years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science, and analysis</li><li>Strong expertise in Python, SQL, and related data science tools</li><li>Experience with Google Cloud &amp; AI platform</li><li>Knowledge of Git or other version control tools</li><li>Familiarity with APIs</li><li>Experience in insurance or financial services is a plus</li><li>Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with an exploratory, curious mindset.</li><li>Relevant successful professional industry experience</li></ul><p></p>
